description: This Italian restaurant offers traditional pasta dishes and grilled steaks. They also serve creamy risotto.

menu.description: At Italian Restaurant, enjoy a selection of classic Italian main courses.

items.name: Lasagna
items.description: Traditional baked pasta with meat ragu, bechamel, and cheese
items.image_prompt: A delicious photo of lasagna, baked with meat ragu, bechamel and cheese at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Tagliata Di Manzo
items.description: Sliced grilled steak with arugula, cherry tomatoes, and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A beautifully plated photo of Tagliata di Manzo with arugula and tomatoes at Italian Restaurant.

items.name: Risotto Ai Funghi
items.description: Creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan
items.image_prompt: A creamy risotto with mixed wild mushrooms and parmesan, served at Italian Restaurant.
